document.full_text: general electric co  and rolls royce group plc  asked the pentagon on thursday to let them resume development, at their own expense, of a controversial alternate engine for the multinational f-35 fighter jet.
document.title: ge, rolls seek to complete second f-35 engine
lines_and_colors: general electric co  and rolls royce group plc  asked the pentagon on thursday to let them resume development, at their own expense, of a controversial alternate engine for the multinational f-35 fighter jet.
